Package ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CheckListProviderView.OnItemToggledListener
    Listener for item checkbox toggle events.
    ConfirmationDialogFragment.OnConfirmListener
    Interface defining a listener for the ConfirmationDialog.
    NotificationAction
    NotificationAction is an interface for what happens when a notification button is selected.
    NotificationInfo.OnNotificationAcknowledgedListener
    the interface for notification acknowledgement.
    ScrollDisableable
    Interface for LayoutManagers whose scrolling can be toggled on and off
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bid
    Bid provides a model of a bid, with a user and a price, that is strictly contained by a task
    BidListAdapter
    For use with ViewBidsActivity Creates and manages Bid Views for the RecyclerView in the activity Defines Button functionality within the Bid Views Should be used with a scrollable LayoutManager which implements ScrollDisableable, though not totally necessary
    BidTest
    unit tests for the Bid class
    BidViewHolder
    Used by BidListAdapter.
    BuildConfig  
    Cache
    Cache for RemoteObjects.
    CacheMatcher<RemoteT extends RemoteObject>
    CacheMatcher provides an abstract class to standardize searching a cache for certain criteria.
    CacheTest  
    CachingClient<TClient extends ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.RemoteClient>
    Caching wrapper around a RemoteClient.
    CachingClientSearcherTest
    Created by peter on 18/03/18.
    CachingClientTest  
    CheckList
    CheckList models a simple to do list items can be strings
    CheckList.CheckListItem
    A single item in the CheckList.
    CheckListEditorView
    View for a task checklist of EditTaskActivity.
    CheckListProviderView
    View for a task checklist of ViewTaskActivity.
    CheckListTest
    Unit tests for CheckList and CheckListItem.
    ConcreteTestObject
    ConcreteTestObject is Used for testing ElasticClient
    ConcreteUserTest
    unit tests for the User class
    ConfirmationDialogFragment
    Fragment to ask for confirmation.
    EditProfileActivity
    Activity for a user to edit their profile.
    EditProfileActivityTest
    Tests for EditProfileActivity.
    EditTaskActivity
    Activity for a task requester to edit a task that they own or to create a new task.
    EditTaskActivityTest
    Tests for EditTaskActivity.
    ElasticClient
    ElasticClient exposes key elasticsearch functionality through the RemoteObject.
    ElasticClientTest
    Created by peter on 17/03/18.
    ElasticSearcher
    object to preform pre-defined searches on a client
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    JSONConstructor
    JSONConstructor provides static methods and classes for writing json in simply in java
    LoginActivity
    Allows a user to log in.
    LoginActivityTest
    Tests for LoginActivity.
    MainActivity
    the entry point to the wrkify app, provides the bottom navigation and delegates to fragments
    MainActivityTest
    Tests for MainActivity.
    NotificationCollector
    Encapsulated list of notifications.
    NotificationCollectorTest  
    NotificationInfo
    Entity representing an abstract notification.
    NotificationView
    View displaying a NotificationInfo object.
    Price
    Price provides an object for the behaviors of a non negative price.
    PriceTest
    Created by peter on 28/03/18.
    ProviderFragment
    ProviderFragment displays the lists of task that a task provider needs to see this Fragment is displayed by MainActivity
    ProviderFragment.AssignedListFragment
    AssignedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are assigned to the session user
    ProviderFragment.BiddedListFragment
    AssignedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are bidded on by the session error
    ProviderFragment.CompletedListFragment
    AssignedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are completed by the session user

    RegisterActivity
    Allows a user to register.
    RegisterActivityTest
    Tests for RegisterActivity.
    RemoteList<T extends RemoteObject>
    RemoteList is a List of Remote objects that can be refreshed.
    RemoteObject
    RemoteObject is an abstract class for defining behaviors of objects that are uploaded to RemoteClients
    RemoteQueryList<T extends RemoteObject>
    RemoteQueryList is a RemoteList that defines refresh behavior based on a query to a remoteClient
    RemoteReference<T extends RemoteObject>
    A RemoteReference is an object consisting of a remote ID that can be dereferenced to produce an object of a specific type.
    RemoteReferenceTest
    Tests for RemoteReference.
    RemoteTaskIntegrationTest
    Created by peter on 18/03/18.
    RemoteUserIntegrationTest
    Created by peter on 18/03/18.
    RequesterFragment
    RequesterFragment displays the lists of task that a task requester needs to see this Fragment is displayed by MainActivity
    RequesterFragment.AssignedListFragment
    AssignedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and have been assigned to a provider
    RequesterFragment.ClosedListFragment
    ClosedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and have been finished
    RequesterFragment.RequestedListFragment
    RequestedListFragment is a TaskListFragment based off of tasks that are requested by the session user and may or may not have been bidded on
    ScrollDisableableLinearLayoutManager
    Normal LinearLayoutManager but can toggle scrolling on and off
    SearcherTest
    Created by peter on 18/03/18.
    SearchFragment
    SearchFragment allows users to search for tasks this Fragment is displayed by MainActivity Uses Searcher for search queries and TaskListAdapter for usage in a RecyclerView of tasks.
    Session
    Session is a global singleton that holds a reference to the user that is currently logged in.
    SetTaskLocationActivity  
    Signal
    Signal is a remoteObject that holds notification info.
    SignalManager
    SignalManager converts signals inro android notifications
    SimpleTransaction1
    Created by peter on 03/04/18.
    SimpleTransaction2
    Created by peter on 03/04/18.
    StateChangeTransaction<T extends RemoteObject>
    Transaction models an atomic change to a RemoteObject transactions subclasses define the apply() function in order to implement the specific behavior.
    StatusView
    StatusView provides a material design chip interface for displaying a Task Status
    Task
    Task is a RemoteObject that stores the information of a task, and provides operations associated with bidding.
    TaskAcceptBidTransaction
    TaskAcceptBidTransaction models accepting a bid as a Transaction
    TaskAddImageTransaction
    TaskAddImageTransaction models Task.addImage() as a Transaction
    TaskAddOrReplaceBidTransaction
    TaskAddOrReplaceBidTransaction models adding a bid to a task, replacing the bidding user's existing bid if it exists.
    TaskCancelBidTransaction
    TaskCancelBidTransaction is the transaction that models canceling a bid.
    TaskCheckListTransaction
    TaskCheckListTransaction represents a Transaction for Task.setCheckList()
    TaskCompleteTransaction
    TaskCompleteTransaction provides a Transaction for the Task.complete() operation.
    TaskCreateTransaction
    TaskCreateTransaction is a Transaction for creating a task
    TaskDeleteTransaction
    TaskDeleteTransaction is a Transaction that models the deleteion of a Task
    TaskDelImageTransaction
    TaskDelImageTransaction models Task.delImage() as a Transaction
    TaskDescriptionTransaction
    TaskDescriptionTransaction represents a Transaction that changes the description of a task.
    TaskListAdapter<T extends Task>
    Adapter for lists of Tasks or objects in that family.
    TaskListFragment
    TaskListFragment is an abstract class that handles the behavior of a List of tasks it defines the behavior of scrolling as well as selecting tasks.
    TaskLocation
    TaskLocation is the Location class used in task to make Elasticsearch location queries work
    TaskLocationTest  
    TaskLocationTransaction
    TaskLocationTransaction represents a Transaction for Task.setLocation()
    TasksNearMeMap  
    TaskTest
    Created by Craig on 2018-02-24.
    TaskTitleTransaction
    TaskTitleTransaction represents a Transaction that changes the title of a task.
    TaskTransactionsTest
    Created by peter on 03/04/18.
    TaskUnassignTransaction
    Created by peter on 03/04/18.
    TaskViewHolder<T extends Task>
    TaskViewHolder acts as a cache for task CardViews for us in tandem with an adapter (TaskListAdapter) and a RecyclerView to minimize costly findViewById calls for a potentially large RecyclerView lists of tasks.
    TestMapsActivity  
    Transaction<T extends RemoteObject>
    Transaction represents a single change to a remote Object that can be applied to a RemoteObject
    TransactionAsyncTask
    TransactionAsyncTask is an AsyncTask for applying as transaction to an object.
    TransactionManager
    TransactionManager is a queue of Transactions
    TransactionTest
    Created by peter on 28/03/18.
    User
    User keeps the username and related contact information of a user and provides getters and setters.
    UserDeleteSignalsTransaction
    UserDeleteSignalsTransaction is a transaction to delete all the signals.
    UserSetEmailTransaction
    Transaction to set a user's email address.
    UserSetPhoneNumberTransaction
    Transaction to set a user's phone number.
    UserView
    Displays a username.
    ViewBidsActivity
    ViewBidsActivity shows a list of bids on a task that the viewer can scroll through, and if the viewer is a requester of said task, they can accept or reject bids Start with an Intent that has extra: EXTRA_VIEWBIDS_TASK: Task that is being viewed
    ViewBidsActivityTest
    Tests for ViewBidsActivity.
    ViewProfileActivity
    ViewProfileActivity displays the contact information of a User, as well as provides the option to edit info
    ViewProfileActivityTest
    Tests for ViewProfileActivity.
    ViewTaskActivity
    ViewTaskActivity displays an expanded view of a Task.
    ViewTaskActivityTest
    Tests for ViewTaskActivity.
    ViewTaskAssignedBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet for a task provider viewing a task that is assigned (to themself or to someone else.) Contains no controls.
    ViewTaskBiddedBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet to use for a task requester viewing a task of their own that has been bidded on.
    ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
    Base class for bottom sheets of the ViewTaskActivity.
    ViewTaskDoneBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet to use for a task that is completed.
    ViewTaskNotificationAction
    ViewTaskNotificationAction is NotificationAction that launches the associated task.
    ViewTaskOpenBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet for a task provider viewing a task that is open or bidded, and that they have not bidded on themselves.
    ViewTaskProviderBiddedBottomSheetFragment
    ViewTaskProviderBidderBottomSheetFragment is the bottomsheet that a user will see if they are the provider or bidder.
    ViewTaskRequestedBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet to use for a task requester viewing their own task that has no bids so far.
    ViewTaskRequesterAssignedBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet to use for a task requester viewing a task they have assigned to a provider.
    WrkifyClient
    WrkifyClient provides a singleton of RemoteClient with the default app settings.

    Task status enum according to US 02.02.01
